content:
Message Message Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Client
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Client.UWP.dll

The data structure represent the message that is used for interacting with IotHub.

Edit

In this Article

public sealed class Message : IDisposable, IReadOnlyIndicatorPublic NotInheritable Class Message
    Implements IDisposable, IReadOnlyIndicator
Inheritance
ObjectObject
MessageMessage

Constructors

Message() Message()

Edit

Default constructor with no body data

public Message()Public Sub New

Message(Byte[]) Message(Byte())

Edit

Constructor which uses the input byte array as the body

public Message([ReadOnlyArray] byte[] byteArray)Public Sub New(byteArray As Byte())
Parameters
byteArray
Byte[] Byte()

a byte array which will be used to form the body stream

Remarks

user should treat the input byte array as immutable when sending the message.

Message(Stream) Message(Stream)

Edit

Constructor which uses the argument stream as the body stream.

public Message(Stream stream)Public Sub New(stream As Stream)
Parameters
stream
Stream Stream

a stream which will be used as body stream.

Remarks

User is expected to own the disposing of the stream when using this constructor.

Value
Stream Stream

Used in message responses and feedback

String String

Time when the message was received by the server

Value
UInt32 UInt32

EnqueuedTimeUtc EnqueuedTimeUtc

Edit

Time when the message was received by the server

public DateTimeOffset EnqueuedTimeUtc { get; }Public ReadOnly Property EnqueuedTimeUtc As DateTimeOffset
Value
DateTimeOffset DateTimeOffset

ExpiryTimeUtc ExpiryTimeUtc

Edit

[Optional] The time when this message is considered expired

public DateTimeOffset ExpiryTimeUtc { get; }Public ReadOnly Property ExpiryTimeUtc As DateTimeOffset
Value
DateTimeOffset DateTimeOffset

LockToken LockToken

Edit

[Required] LockToken of the received message

public string LockToken { get; }Public ReadOnly Property LockToken As String
Value
String String

MessageId MessageId

Edit

[Required for two way requests] Used to correlate two-way communication. Format: A case-sensitive string ( up to 128 char long) of ASCII 7-bit alphanumeric chars

  • {'-', ':', '/', '\', '.', '+', '%', '_', '#', '*', '?', '!', '(', ')', ',', '=', '@', ';', '$', '''}. Non-alphanumeric characters are from URN RFC.
public string MessageId { get; set; }Public Property MessageId As String
Value
String String

Properties Properties

Edit

Gets the dictionary of user properties which are set when user send the data.

public IDictionary<string, string> Properties { get; }Public ReadOnly Property Properties As IDictionary(Of String, String)
Value
IDictionary<String, String> IDictionary(Of String, String)

SequenceNumber SequenceNumber

Edit

[Required] SequenceNumber of the received message

public ulong SequenceNumber { get; }Public ReadOnly Property SequenceNumber As ULong
Value
UInt64 UInt64

To To

Edit

[Required] Destination of the message

public string To { get; set; }Public Property To As String
Value
String String

UserId UserId

Edit

[Required in feedback messages] Used to specify the origin of messages generated by device hub. Possible value: “{hub name}/”

public string UserId { get; set; }Public Property UserId As String
Value
String String

Dispose() Dispose()

Edit

Dispose the current event data instance

public void Dispose()Public Sub Dispose

GetBodyStream() GetBodyStream()

Edit

Return the body stream of the current event data instance

public Stream GetBodyStream()Public Function GetBodyStream As Stream
Returns
Stream Stream
Exceptions
InvalidOperationException InvalidOperationException

throws if the method has been called.

ObjectDisposedException ObjectDisposedException

throws if the event data has already been disposed.

Remarks

This method can only be called once and afterwards method will throw InvalidOperationException.

Edit

This methods return the body stream as a byte array

Byte[] Byte()
